Text:
Hello

Could you by any chance make similar SWF torrent for recent version (1.4) or give pointers on how to extract working SWF from exe?

1) Buy game on steam
2) Download game
3) Start game
4) Open Windows temporary folder
5) Sort by date
6) Find last folder created with something like "~wd" in the name
7) Copy folder
8) Rename the biggest ".dat" file into an SWF
9) ???
10) Profit
Echotrash, nothing like that appears on my temp folder....
